TITLE: Starting CodexMCP Server
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the CodexMCP server using the console script.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tomascupr/codexmcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
codexmcp
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing CodexMCP Package
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the CodexMCP package using pip package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tomascupr/codexmcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pip install codexmcp
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating OpenAI API Key Environment File
DESCRIPTION: Example of creating a .env file with the OpenAI API key configuration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tomascupr/codexmcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: ini
CODE:
```
OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-<your-key>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running CodexMCP Tests
DESCRIPTION: Commands for installing test dependencies and running tests with pytest, including coverage reporting and specific test file execution.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tomascupr/codexmcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# Install the package in editable mode with test dependencies
pip install -e .[test]

# Run all tests
pytest

# Run with coverage report
pytest --cov=codexmcp

# Run specific test file
pytest tests/test_tools.py
```

TITLE: Code Explanation Task Template in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: A markdown template that outlines how to explain code at different detail levels (brief, medium, detailed) with specific focus areas for technical analysis.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tomascupr/codexmcp/blob/main/src/codexmcp/prompts/explain_code.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
# Task: Code Explanation
You are a technical educator tasked with explaining code to {detail_level} level of detail.

## Code to Explain
{code}

## Explanation Guidelines for '{detail_level}' Detail Level
- Brief: Provide a concise 2-3 sentence high-level overview of what the code does
- Medium: Explain main functions/classes and their purposes, key algorithms, and overall structure
- Detailed: Provide comprehensive breakdown of all components, logic flows, design patterns, and potential edge cases

## Focus Areas
- Overall purpose and functionality
- Key algorithms and data structures
- Control flow and execution path
- Important design patterns or techniques used
- Potential performance considerations or limitations
```

TITLE: Documentation Structure Template in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: Template showing the expected documentation structure and requirements for code documentation generation. Supports multiple output formats including docstrings, markdown, and HTML documentation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tomascupr/codexmcp/blob/main/src/codexmcp/prompts/generate_docs.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
# Task: Documentation Generation\nYou are a technical writer creating professional documentation for code.\n\n## Code to Document\n{code}\n\n## Documentation Format: {doc_format}\n- docstring: Generate language-appropriate docstrings embedded in the code\n- markdown: Create standalone markdown documentation with sections for classes, functions, usage examples\n- html: Produce HTML documentation with proper structure, highlighting, and navigation\n\n## Documentation Requirements\n- Clearly describe all functions, classes, and methods\n- Document parameters, return types, and exceptions\n- Include usage examples for key components\n- Specify any important dependencies or requirements\n- Follow best practices for the specified documentation format\n\n## Output Format\nProvide only the documentation without any additional explanations.
```

TITLE: Installing OpenAI Codex CLI with npm
DESCRIPTION: Command to globally install the OpenAI Codex CLI package using npm package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tomascupr/codexmcp/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install -g @openai/codex
```

TITLE: Documenting Version 0.1.3 Changes in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: Details the changes made in version 0.1.3, including new tools, test suite additions, and prompt enhancements.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tomascupr/codexmcp/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
## [0.1.3] - 2025-04-21

### Added

- Two new tools:
  - `explain_code`: Explains code at various detail levels ("brief", "medium", "detailed")
  - `generate_docs`: Generates documentation in different formats ("docstring", "markdown", "html")
- Comprehensive test suite:
  - Unit tests for all core modules (tools, pipe, server, shared)
  - Test fixtures and configurations
  - Coverage reporting setup
  - Testing documentation in README

### Changed

- Enhanced all tool prompts with:
  - Role-playing elements (e.g., "You are an expert developer...")
  - Specific guidelines for quality, formatting, and edge cases
  - Improved structure with clear sections
  - More detailed instructions for better outputs
- Added pytest configuration in pyproject.toml
- Updated requirements.txt with test dependencies
```

TITLE: Documenting Version 0.1.0 Changes in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: Outlines the initial project structure and features added in version 0.1.0, along with bug fixes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tomascupr/codexmcp/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
## [0.1.0] - 2025-04-20

### Added

- Initial project structure with FastMCP server wrapping Codex CLI.
- Tools: `generate_code`, `refactor_code`, `write_tests`.
- Logging to `~/.codexmcp/logs/codexmcp.log`.
- Setup script (`setup.sh`).
- `.env` file support for `OPENAI_API_KEY` using `python-dotenv`.
- Versioning (`__version__` in `shared.py`) and this CHANGELOG file.

### Fixed

- Resolved circular import issue between `server.py` and `tools.py` by introducing `shared.py` for singletons.
- Corrected issues with tool registration not being recognized by `mcp-cli`.
- Improved handling of API key propagation to the Codex subprocess.
- Fixed various bugs related to server startup and `CodexPipe` initialization.
```

TITLE: Documenting Version 0.1.1 Changes in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: Details the changes made in version 0.1.1, including project restructuring and import updates.
SOURCE: https://github.com/tomascupr/codexmcp/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
## [0.1.1] - 2025-04-20

### Added

- Restructured project to use the `src/` layout with `pyproject.toml` packaging
- Added `codexmcp` console script entry point via `[project.scripts]`

### Changed

- Updated imports to use package-relative paths within `codexmcp` namespace
- Bumped package version to 0.1.1

### Fixed

- Added `main()` function in `server.py` for module entry point
- Improved `.env` loading to check current directory first and warned if missing
- Resolved `ImportError` issues for `logging_cfg`, `shared`, and `tools` modules
```
